phrases: I wish I could gather every single one and keep them in a treasure box.
No sappy conversations allowed, especially in the intro!
No sappy conversations allowed, especially in the intro!
Would not you want to forget all the bad things, though?
Athena's treasure box will not unlock!
Dear Ai, the weather in Neo-Venezia has been beautiful lately.
When you look up at the sunny, clear blue sky,
does not it sometimes make you feel like you are a fish at the bottom of the sea...
By any chance, is she the one who invited you?
It was Athena's idea at first.
She said, Once it gets warmer, let us go on a picnic, but...
Spring came, but Athena's been so busy, we have not had the chance to discuss it.
So that is why you invited her.
It just so happens that Athena has a rare day off tomorrow, so...
Well, I guess picnics are nice once in a while.
I hope you two have a fun picnic, Alice.
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
I want to spend my days waving to you Itsumademo te o furitai hibi
This is my proof that I was here with you Koko ni tashika ni kimi to ita akashi
There is a path which stretches on ahead Kono saki mo tsuzuiteru michi ga aru
When you climb the next hill, Tsugi no saka o nobottara
Let us meet again Mata aimashou
The Memories of That Precious Person...
We will leave early tomorrow morning.
First, we will head towards the Canal Grande.
If we turn around at this point in the canal,
the morning sun should be sweeping over Neo-Venezia.
It is supposed to be really beautiful.
After that, we will head to Murano Island and have lunch.
I will draw up a schedule for tomorrow.
That way Athena will understand right away.
I will bring two bananas tomorrow, one for dessert and one for snack time.
It gets really chilly after dark, does not it?
President Maa, it is still a little early, but let us go take a bath and warm ourselves up!
Okay, let us go, President Maa.
We need to go to the cafeteria later...
Let us bring lots of different teas, too.
Why do not we ask the cafeteria lady if she can recommend some rare teas?
It is great, is not it?
They gave us so many bananas.
Ah, looks like Athena is back.
Athena, you need to close the door properly, or...
I guess we just missed each other in the bath.
She must have had a last-minute booking...
President Maa, leave the lunch alone until we get to Murano Island!
This lunch is for two people...
Um, it was not something I could...
Um, Alice, why do not we go right now?
We cannot go very far, but-
I said it is fine, did not I?!
We cannot go very far, but-
I said it is fine, did not I?!
Why am I being so harsh to her?
Akari, I will clean this up, so could you get it please?
Hello, this is the Aria Company.
This is a really big SO IS, Akari!
You sounded so panicked over the phone...
Athena's unusually quick and responsive today, is not she?
On top of that, she said we must be her friends.
We also have black tea, if you would like.
Please tell me when you would like some more.
Looks like her memory loss altered her personality as well.
I am at a complete loss about what to do...
I know it is really sudden.
After all, it is for Athena's sake.
Ah, right, first stop should be the hospital, should not it?
If you do not lose some weight, you will get diabetes someday.
It just happened to come out naturally.
It is no use, it is no use!
It is no use, it is no use!
What kind of magic did you use?
It is nothing to worry about.
I am sure it is just a temporary memory mix-up.
In the meantime, why do not you stay with her today and see if she gets any better?
If she does not, we will take her to the hospital tomorrow.
Well then, I am off to work.
Somehow, I feel much better now.
Hey, why do not we take her to places she knows?
Instead of staying in this room, Athena might recover faster elsewhere.
I will keep you two company!
I am sure she will remember lots of things if we go to places she is used to.
Now that I have calmed down, I just had a scary thought.
Right now, Athena is quick, responsive, and is not clumsy at all.
Maybe it is actually okay if her memory does not come back...
You know that is not right...
The shop we are headed to now serves lots of different hot chocolates.
I am looking forward to it!
On top of that, Athena is a regular, so they have a special menu just for her.
We will also have this, this... and this please.
We are going back to Orange Planet!
I am going to try and jog her memory in a more familiar setting.
You finally have a day off, and you are not going out?
Please have your friend make herself at home!
Who was that person just now?
Please have your friend make herself at home!
Please have your friend make herself at home!
Athena, just concentrate on one thing at a time.
Athena, which one is your favorite oar that you always use?
You are recovering slowly but surely, Athena!
I am sure Alicia will be back soon, so why do not we all go to the Aria Company?
I am sorry for asking you to carry President Aria, Athena.
I like the way President Aria feels.
I am the only one Athena does not remember...
What kind of person was I to you?
You were a very clumsy mentor...
As your roommate, you always used to trouble me with your constant mistakes...
I guess you hated me, huh?
If I had to choose one or the other, I guess it would be the latter...
Do not you think that is enough, Athena?
My amnesia was all a lie.
I am always causing you trouble because I am so clumsy, right?
After what happened this morning, I thought you might have finally gotten fed up with me.
So I wanted to know how you truly felt...
That is why I thought, if I got amnesia,
I would be able to ask how you felt about me and get an honest answer...
Next time, please do not be so sneaky about it.
First of all, if you can be graceful like that, then be that way all the time!
But it is really exhausting to act like that...
It is only because I have seen Athena pull some unbelievable stunts from time to time.
It never occurred to me that someone like Athena, one the Three Great Water Fairies,
would worry about things like that...
We are just like any other girls, after all.
We all wonder how the people we hold dear feel about us...
Especially if it is our cute apprentices.
Then, do you get worried about me too, Alicia?
Then, do you get worried about me too, Alicia?
Then, do you get worried about me too, Alicia?
Ai, when you like someone, that feeling might bring an equal amount of worry, too.
Akari, I am sure that after this incident, Alice and Athena will become even closer.
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
As my thoughts focus intently on someone, Dareka no koto o tsuyoku omou toki
Love rests on my palm, held high Kakageta te no hira ni ai ga tomaru
A future guided by the flow of water and wind Mizu no yukue to kaze ga shimesu mirai
I gaze at the hope that surrounds this world Kono hoshi o tsusumu kibou mitsumete
The distant clouds of light are beckoning now Tooi kumo hikari ga sasou you ni yureru i am about to
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
